ioedata.sensordata.service

Interface DataService


  • public interface DataService
    This interface provides methods to both access and manipulate data in the sensor database and collect and control sensor end devices.
    Author:
    ajou

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • storeSensorData

        boolean storeSensorData(java.lang.String deviceSerialNum,
                      java.lang.String sensorName,
                      double sensorDataValue)
                        throws SensorNotExistException,
                               DeviceNotExistException
        Insert sensor data into cloud server. First check whether the sensor with a typical sensor name exists. If it does, return true; if not, return false.
        Parameters:
        deviceSerialNum -
        sensorName -
        sensorDataValue -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        SensorNotExistException
        DeviceNotExistException
